title: Top 20 Players
body:
im so lazy

just guna put all the 15 korean players at the top 15 and then the last 5 top player to the TSM team

there ya go

replies.body:
Probably about right.

Except Impact at 20 over hauntzer.
The absence of Impact on the list was a real surprise. Sorry LoL, but ESPN eSports did a better job of listing players to watch for.
Could just do 20 Korean players if you want they got enough people playing in other regions.
